summary: Two new classrooms,Archives and Spellmaking Chamber with Spellmaking Altar
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff00ff][size=4][b][center][u]To avoid complications rather install after the College's Questline[/u][/center][/b][/size][/color]


[color=#6fa8dc]A expansion of interior of college.Ever wondered where are their classroms,or where do they actually enchant items.[/color]
[color=#6fa8dc]This mod adds two classrooms which can be entered from Hall of Elements.[/color]
[color=#6fa8dc]The Classroom of Attainment and a Classroom of Countenance.[/color]
[color=#6fa8dc]Also adds an Enchanting Labaratory in Classroom of Attainment,while the other has Debate Segment.[/color]

[color=#6fa8dc]In classroom of Attainment. should be Mirabelle E.,which is revived and responds to you with : Arch Mage,and[/color]
[color=#6fa8dc]also from time to time Collete.[/color]

[u]Version 2.0Â [/u]
The Classrooms are now unique look,one is supposedly for reading and another is classical teaching classroom.
They each have an professors quarters and also Classroom Of Attainment has enchanting quarters,while the other has Caffeteria segment.
Beside the two Main Classrooms there is Corridor of Archmages,Archivae and Spellmaking Chamber on the first floor.
On the second floor above Hall Of C. is Observatorium.Hope you do not mind how I improvised it.

[u]Version 2.1
[/u]Added the Altar of Spellmaking.There you can craft all scrolls,based on your Enchant level.The conditioned level varies from 20 to 60.

[b][i]See the pics :)[/i][/b]
[b][i]Hope you enjoy it :)
